thread.title: BoredPanda shares awkward gifts bought by grandmas
thread.title_full: BoredPanda shares awkward gifts bought by grandmas

title: BoredPanda shares awkward gifts bought by grandmas
text: Share this article Share One man is sure not to leave the house in a t-shirt that says I heart BJ while a pair of gloves printed with cannabis leaves clearly went over a grandmother's head. And while they mean well your grandparents may not necessarily share your taste in fashion as many of these grandchildren discovered when they were gifted loud waistcoats and traditional nightwear. This gentlemen's name is Brodie Jonas Dean and so his grandmother was thrilled to find a t-shirt with his initials on, not understanding the reference to a sexual favour One woman revealed that her seven-year-old daughter had asked for fingerless gloves with flowers printed on and an innocent minded grandmother accidentally chose a cannabis print After finding out her granddaughter had moved in with her boyfriend one grandmother gifted her this rather modest nightgown Some young men were thrilled with their grandmother's choice in psychedelic cat t-shirts In a rather ironic photograph a grandmother uses a camera phone to snap a photo but chooses to send the picture to her granddaughter by post This user wasn't thrilled with the coffee cup gifted to him by his grandma A loving nana crocheted a scarf blanket for her grandson not factoring in for the awkward positioning of the fin This man looks less than thrilled with his 90-year Old Grandma's handmade waistcoat that she made for him to wear to parties A caring grandparent spent time lovingly stitching this accessory for her grandson's jeep Many grandmothers found unconventional ways to keep their grandchildren warm This man asked for new hats having no idea what his grandmother would produce for her and his son Though it is bound to keep him warm this scarf may be a little long for this man One grandmother was obviously feeling festive when she crafted this turkey hat for her grandson for Christmas It is likely that this grandmother was unaware of the rude message that awaits the drinker of this cup One grandmother found the perfect way to personalise her gifts for Christmas This man accidentally opened a gift intended for a female cousin from his grandma but says he has every intention of keeping it One grandmother provided her grandson with this kitsch kitten blanket to sleep under A teen jokingly said he wanted 100 things from the dollar store for Christmas and his grandmother provided A middle aged professional revealed the rather quirky lunchbox his grandmother bought for him as a birthday gift This man was actually thrilled with the hoodie that his grandmother gifted him One grandmother made rather unconventional gifts in the form of cushions crafted from her old t-shirts This student thought their grandmother had bought them a photo album for their graduation only to discover a rather special surprise Read more: Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
